channel.title: «PI» how to change ports on client and server
channel.description:
[b]how to change ports on client and server[/b]
Using this server
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,511978.0.html
Im planning on changing my port from 43594 to 5555, could anyone explain? I'm new to coding.

item.title: «PI» how to change ports on client and server
item.dc:creator: @Owner_satan Owner satan
item.description:
@Owner_satan wrote:

[quote=“Zentior, post:3, topic:431746”]Thanks, helps me out alot. And am i supposed to change every single one of them?[/quote]Yea dude. If you want to change them client sided go to client.java in your client folder and do the same thing. Hope I helped

Read full topic
item.source: «PI» how to change ports on client and server

item.title: «PI» how to change ports on client and server
item.dc:creator: @jaruanna jaruanna
item.description:
@jaruanna wrote:

Go to your server.java in your source and search 43594. It would be there a couple of times so change all of them to 5555. In your client.java in your client, search 43594 and change those to 5555.

Read full topic
